name: Lost in Morph(Game Jam)
description:
This is a game about finding out what happened to everyone. They disappeared mysteriously and you must go through the levels and free them. You are given different world altering abilities. 

Controls: A and D to move left and right. Press the Space Bar to jump. If you mess up, you can press R to restart the level. 

You can turn White by pressing the Left mouse button and Blue by pressing the Right Mouse Button. 

To turn Red you can use either The Middle Mouse Button or E. 

This game was made for the Trijam #153: The 3 hour game jam.  

The theme is Empty World. My game fits the theme by being set in a world where all people have disappeared and the player must go around and free them. 

I had a lot of fun making this, I hope you guys enjoy it too! 

Thanks for playing!
